title: Chapter 1729
body:
Chapter 1729

1729 The confrontation between souls

This scene was seen by everyone present, and it made their hearts tremble. This was especially so for the people from the sky demon sect and the Yu Du sect. They were almost scared to death.

An absolute Saint was killed by Lu Ming’s halberd.

...

How did Lu Ming have such powerful strength?

“Damn it, damn it! How can this little bastard control such a terrifying power?”

The Grandmaster of the sky demon sect was the most shocked. He kept screaming in his heart, and his face was twisted.

hahaha, good kill. Evil Spirit’s remnants are destined to be destroyed again!

The valley master laughed, and his sword light was like a dragon, forcing an evil spirit absolute Saint to retreat.

“How is that possible?”

The blood demon master’s giant face also screamed.

“Blood demon King, I’ll kill you now!”

Lu Ming held the reincarnation halberd and charged at the blood demon Queen.

The reincarnation halberd could kill anyone below the Emperor level. Although the blood demon King was an Emperor level expert at his peak, he was only left with a wisp of soul, so he could still be killed.

damn it, a bunch of trash. I can only take over his body now!

The blood demon master roared and turned into a ray of blood light, rushing into Xie nianqing’s forehead.

“Not good!”

Lu Ming’s expression changed and he rushed towards Xie nianqing.

“Little Qing, wake up!”

Lu Ming shouted, but it was useless. Xie nianqing did not wake up.

Moreover, Xie nianqing’s body was covered in a layer of blood light. Her body trembled slightly and her face showed pain.

Lu Ming was extremely anxious. Clearly, the blood demon King was trying to possess Xie nianqing. He wanted to destroy Xie nianqing’s spiritual will and replace him.

Lu Ming would never let such a thing happen.

“Let’s go all out!”

Lu Ming’s eyes were filled with determination. He took a step forward and activated the array Dao law. Countless runes appeared on the ground.

Runes were not inscriptions, they were of a higher level. Only those who had comprehended the power of laws could release them.

A large array enveloped Lu Ming and he sat down cross-legged. The space between his brows glowed and a small person appeared. It was Lu Ming’s soul.

Lu Ming’s soul rushed to Xie nianqing’s glabella and entered it.

The next moment, Lu Ming’s soul appeared in a vast land. This place was Xie nianqing’s sea of consciousness.

The moment Lu Ming entered, he saw Xie nianqing’s figure.

At this moment, Xie nianqing was surrounded by a cloud of blood-red mist.

“Little Qing!”

Lu Ming roared and rushed over.

Xie nianqing’s figure wasn’t his soul. He hadn’t broken through to the Saint plane yet, so he hadn’t condensed his soul. It was his spiritual will.

One’s spiritual will could project a physical form in one’s sea of consciousness. It was just like how Lu Ming could project a physical form in his own sea of consciousness a long time ago. However, it was impossible for his soul to enter other people’s sea of consciousness like Lu Ming.

Once one’s spiritual will broke through to the Saint realm, it would form a soul.

If the blood demon King refined Xie nianqing’s spiritual will, it would be equivalent to Xie nianqing disappearing from the world.

“Lu Ming!”

Xie nianqing exclaimed. He did not expect Lu Ming to come to her sea of consciousness.

“Blood demon King, die!”

Lu Ming turned into a ray of light and rushed toward the blood demon King. With a swing of his palm, the law of chaos circulated and slashed at the blood demon King’s soul.

Nomological laws were grasped after one had comprehended them. They borrowed the laws of heaven and earth and not one’s own energy. Therefore, the soul could also use the laws.

“Brat, you’re looking for death!”

die! the blood demon Queen shouted coldly and condensed into a human form. It was the form of an old woman. She stretched out her withered claws and grabbed at Lu Ming.

Bang!

Lu Ming’s palm struck the blood demon King’s Claw. He immediately felt a terrifying force surge over, as if it was going to tear his arm apart.

Lu Ming’s figure retreated rapidly. The chaos laws circulated continuously and finally obliterated this force.

Although the blood demon King was only a wisp of his soul, he was an Emperor-level existence at his peak. His Foundation was too strong, and Lu Ming could not match him at all.

Even though Lu Ming’s soul force was already equivalent to a Supreme Saint, it was useless.

“Brat, not only will you not be able to save this little girl today, even you will have to stay here!”

The blood demon Queen sneered and floated toward Lu Ming. Her withered claws continued to claw at Lu Ming.

“Godly sword technique!”

Lu Ming had an idea. He circulated the divine sword technique. His entire body turned into a sword, a sword of the soul, and slashed at the blood demon King.

it’s actually a soul-destroying divine sword technique. It’s a pity that your soul power is too weak!

The blood demon Queen sneered. Her claws grabbed the soul spirit battle sword that Lu Ming had transformed into. A sound of metal clashing was heard and the soul spirit battle sword was sent flying.

Buzzzzzz!

The soul spirit sword transformed back into Lu Ming. In a flash, Lu Ming appeared beside Xie nianqing.

“Little Qing, are you alright?”

Lu Ming looked at Xie nianqing worriedly.

“I’m fine. Lu Ming, why are you here? leave quickly, leave this place quickly!”

Xie nianqing said anxiously.

silly girl, what nonsense are you saying? if you’re in danger, why would I leave? if I have to die today, I’ll die with you!

Lu Ming said, his voice full of tenderness.

“Then I’ll send you on your way and let you two be a pair of mandarin ducks sharing the same fate!”

The blood demon Queen sneered and attacked the two of them, clawing at them.

“This is my sea of consciousness. Get out!”

Xie nianqing shouted. Her spiritual will glowed, and a terrifying fluctuation spread toward the blood demon master.

The evil spirit discipline King’s eyes revealed a grave expression. His two claws continuously struck out, breaking that invisible fluctuation.

It wasn’t easy to possess someone. Just like Xie nianqing said, this was her sea of consciousness.

In her sea of consciousness, Xie nianqing was able to unleash a terrifying power to destroy foreign souls.

Therefore, the blood demon master had always wanted to devour and refine more souls to strengthen his own soul before he began to possess Xie nianqing.

But now, she was forced to start the possession in advance.

“Kill!”

Lu Ming continued to cast the divine sword technique and transformed into a divine sword. He cooperated with Xie nianqing to fight against the blood demon master.

Meanwhile, the battle outside was getting more and more intense.

A large number of experts had fallen here forever, their blood staining the entire demon mountain.

The sect master of the sky demon sect looked anxious when he saw Lu Ming’s soul enter Xie nianqing’s body.

“You guys, go and kill Lu Ming. Hurry!”

The sect master of the sky demon sect shouted.

A few great saints immediately pounced on Lu Ming.

“You’re looking for death!”

With a long roar, the sword light broke through the sky and two Supreme Saints were killed instantly.

With a flash of sword-light, the cloud Dragon Valley master appeared beside Lu Ming, holding his sword to block the attack.

kill! We must kill Lu Ming and let the Shakyamuni successfully possess him!

The sect master of the sky demon sect shrieked.

All of this involved her future. If the blood demon King succeeded, she would have a chance to become a great emperor in the future. She must not be ruined by Lu Ming.

The sect master of the sky demon sect used all his strength to force his opponent to retreat before charging towards the cloud Dragon Valley master.

At the same time, the other two absolute Saints also rushed toward the cloud Dragon Valley master.

At that moment, two more absolute Saints appeared on evil Spirit’s side. Evil spirit had the advantage of absolute Saints.
